title: Transform your in-store screens into high-impact revenue drivers
pars: Broadsign helps retailers transform in-store screens into dynamic digital experiences that drive sales, boost loyalty, and unlock new advertising revenue.

With our flexible platform, you can deliver targeted, data-driven campaigns directly to your shoppers — and provide advertisers with buying options that fit their strategy, from guaranteed deals to impression-based campaigns.
giftCardTitle: Want a chance to win a $250 gift card?
giftCardDesc: *Book a call with our Sales Development Manager* by filling out the form and learn how to optimize your in-store media.
formTitle: Fill out the form & book a call for a chance to win!
formDesc: Once the form has been completed, you'll be redirected to book a call with one of our Sales Development Managers — completing the booking is required to be entered into the giveaway.
